name: Twitch Dark Theme Enhancer
description:
Modifies the current Twitch.tv dark theme to resemble its older dark theme.

GitHub: https://github.com/loopy750/Twitch-Dark-Theme-Enhancer
additional_info: Style Settings Top Navigation Menu: Choose between Purple or the Default grey colour. Channel Info Background Colour: Select the colour used for the channel information bar below the video. Smooth Chat Scrolling: Smooth scrolling effect with new chat room messages. Enable - Smooth Fix (Firefox): Select for Firefox. Smoother but mouse scrolling doesn't work. Live Time Format (Experimental): Remove the seconds displayed from live time view. Note: Due to limitations this may not function as expected on all systems.
